ayah: عَسَىٰ رَبُّنَآ أَن يُبۡدِلَنَا خَيۡرٗا مِّنۡهَآ إِنَّآ إِلَىٰ رَبِّنَا رَٰغِبُونَ
ayah_translit: asa rabbuna an yub'dilana khayran min'ha inna ila rabbina raghibuna

ayah: يَوۡمَ يُكۡشَفُ عَن سَاقٖ وَيُدۡعَوۡنَ إِلَى ٱلسُّجُودِ فَلَا يَسۡتَطِيعُونَ
ayah_translit: yawma yuk'shafu an saqin wayud'awna ila al-sujudi fala yastati'una
ayah_english: (The) Day will be uncovered from the shin and they will be called to prostrate but not they will be able

ayah: خَٰشِعَةً أَبۡصَٰرُهُمۡ تَرۡهَقُهُمۡ ذِلَّةٞۖ وَقَدۡ كَانُواْ يُدۡعَوۡنَ إِلَى ٱلسُّجُودِ وَهُمۡ سَٰلِمُونَ
ayah_translit: khashi'atan absaruhum tarhaquhum dhillatun waqad kanu yud'awna ila al-sujudi wahum salimuna
ayah_english: Humbled their eyes will cover them humiliation And indeed they were called to prostrate while they (were) sound

ayah: فَذَرۡنِي وَمَن يُكَذِّبُ بِهَٰذَا ٱلۡحَدِيثِۖ سَنَسۡتَدۡرِجُهُم مِّنۡ حَيۡثُ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ
ayah_translit: fadharni waman yukadhibu bihadha al-hadithi sanastadrijuhum min haythu la ya'lamuna
ayah_english: So leave Me and whoever denies this Statement We will progressively lead them from where not they know

ayah: أَمۡ عِندَهُمُ ٱلۡغَيۡبُ فَهُمۡ يَكۡتُبُونَ

ayah_english: Or (is) with them the unseen so they write it

ayah: فَٱصۡبِرۡ لِحُكۡمِ رَبِّكَ وَلَا تَكُن كَصَاحِبِ ٱلۡحُوتِ إِذۡ نَادَىٰ وَهُوَ مَكۡظُومٞ
ayah_translit: fa-is'bir lihuk'mi rabbika wala takun kasahibi al-huti idh nada wahuwa makzumun
ayah_english: So be patient for (the) decision (of) your Lord and (do) not be like (the) companion (of) the fish when he called out while he (was) distressed

ayah: لَّوۡلَآ أَن تَدَٰرَكَهُۥ نِعۡمَةٞ مِّن رَّبِّهِۦ لَنُبِذَ بِٱلۡعَرَآءِ وَهُوَ مَذۡمُومٞ
ayah_translit: lawla an tadarakahu ni'matun min rabbihi lanubidha bil-'arai wahuwa madhmumun
ayah_english: If not that overtook him a Favor from his Lord surely he would have been thrown onto (the) naked shore while he (was) blamed

ayah: وَإِن يَكَادُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لَيُزۡلِقُونَكَ بِأَبۡصَٰرِهِمۡ لَمَّا سَمِعُواْ ٱلذِّكۡرَ وَيَقُولُونَ إِنَّهُۥ لَمَجۡنُونٞ
ayah_translit: wa-in yakadu alladhina kafaru layuz'liqunaka bi-absarihim lamma sami'u al-dhik'ra wayaquluna innahu lamajnunun
ayah_english: And indeed would almost those who disbelieve surely make you slip with their eyes when they hear the Message and they say Indeed he (is) surely mad

ayah: وَمَا هُوَ إِلَّا ذِكۡرٞ لِّلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
ayah_translit: wama huwa illa dhik'run lil'alamina
ayah_english: And not it (is) but a Reminder to the worlds
